tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retention_policies (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    retention_period INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    created_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE DataRetentionPolicy (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(50),
  retention_period INT,
  legal_requirement VARCHAR(100),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DataDeletionLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  record_id INT,
  deletion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  reason VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE data_item (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT,
    category_id INT REFERENCES data_category(category_id),
    date_created DATE,
    is_sensitive BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE data_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_category_id INT,
    record_data JSONB,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_category_id) REFERENCES data_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_access_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    access_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES data_records(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deletion_requests (
    request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    request_date TIMESTAMP,
    reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES data_records(record_id)
);
